revision.text: Possibly: Phytologia; or the Philosophy of Agriculture and Gardening. With the Theory of Draining Morasses, and with an Improved Construction of the Drill Plough. By Erasmus Darwin, M. D. F. R. S. Author of Zoonomia, and of the The Botanic Garden, by Erasmus Darwin. (London : Printed for J. Johnson, St. Paul's Church-Yard; by T. Bensley, Bolt Court, Fleet Street, 1800). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2507638~S1
